DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read the names, descriptions, and settings of channels
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Read all channel names, channel descriptions, and channel settings, on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Read the names, descriptions, and settings of channels
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Read all channel names, channel descriptions, and channel settings, on your behalf.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read the names, descriptions, and settings of all channels
Application.adminDescription: Read all channel names, channel descriptions, and channel settings, without a signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and write the names, descriptions, and settings of channels
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Read and write the names, descriptions, and settings of all channels, on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Read and write the names, descriptions, and settings of channels
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Read and write the names, descriptions, and settings of all channels, on your behalf.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write the names, descriptions, and settings of all channels
Application.adminDescription: Read and write the names, descriptions, and settings of all channels, without a signed-in user.
